fetchedMessages.content: Quick reminder you should also be attending events announced in <#856120319034654720>, if you cannot attend them you should react as such and leave a <#679022965618376704>

<@&856859788544835585> 
Attached are your IT deadlines (dates next to your name), failure to attend a vessel training by the date listed will result in your removal from the navy. There will be at least 1 Vessel training hosted once a day, however you are more than welcome to arrange a private training if you DM an instructor if you are unable to attend the trainings when they are hosted. 

If you feel you are unable to complete your IT before the date please do DM myself, <@372045243186544642> or <@285897998150402049> so we can sort something out.

**RECRUITMENT PROCESS**
> Phase 1 - Induction: This is where you started. Your Instructor will cover basic skills such as drill and other basic knowledge which will help you through the other phases. 

> Phase 2 - Vessel: Your Instructor will then walk you through the weapon systems aboard the Type 23 Frigate HMS Nelson. You will also be covering: RHIB Operations and Coxswain Skills. 

---

Upon completion of the two phases, you will be informed as to whether you have passed or failed Initial Training - should you have passed you will become a full rating and hence will be eligible for promotions and Good Conduct Stripes. Should you have failed, you will be removed from the Royal Navy group and server.

All recruits have 7 days to complete Initial Training, this is to help prevent it from stagnating. Should you need longer than 7 days to complete Initial Training you are expected to DM the Chief Instructor or a Senior Instructor, requesting an extension and providing a valid reason. 

Please send a request to the Royal Navy and BAF group if you haven't already: 
<https://www.roblox.com/groups/921931/UK-British-Forces>
<https://www.roblox.com/groups/1197643/UK-The-Royal-Navy#!/about>
